review_data.title: Best since 20 years or so
review_data.content: I tried it more than 20 years ago and still think it is one of the best places outside of Israel for a great Falafel. Not easy to find but well worth it. Great value for money too.

review_data.title: Wow - superfeines original Falafelsandwich
review_data.content: Sehr feine Falafel -frisch zubereitet! Richtig volles, sättigendes Sandwich; die Sesamsauce schmeckt auch toll, alles perfekt!

review_data.title: Guter Falafel
review_data.content: Guter Falafel, jedes Mal frisch zubereitet. Dafür wartet man auch mal eine ganze Weile, vor allem zur Mittagszeit. Die Toppings...More

review_data.title: Good value tasty and fresh
review_data.content: Great falafel sandwiches freshly made Tasty salads hummus fresh pitta bread Limited hours open till two pm (I think) five days a week Friendly owner operator fair price for Zurich

review_data.title: Best Falafel in Town!
review_data.content: Not much to say the Uni Falafel/Falafel Imbissecke is in my opinion the best Falafel place in town, especially as a fast-food/take away place. The hummus is great! Everything is handmade and quite tasty.
